title: Farming better tips please
body:
Hi I have been watching streams of good players to help me get better playing lol and I am a girl I know it's a guys game but I like to play it and I want to be a better adc.
My question is when farming does holding the s button help? I watch some streams and they stand still for a while and wait for the last hit. My problem with being adc is relying on my support to not go in on the enemy when I am trying to farm.
Any tips would be appreciated! :)

replies.body:
action is a resource play an rts (otherthan sandbox MOBA) and learn economics in and out and then transfer that to your play, study ludwig von mises' treatise on human action & praxeology. learn ergo sum homo economis xx
ergo sum homo economicus
homo economicus

also gold and backs... nobody knows how to play this game, your pro tiers are fucking garbage. anyone decent doesnt play this game. im the only one. do you understand? im talking globally. im the only.

Please stop commenting on my posts, that was painful to read.

I have like 15 more things to say about that but I will keep it to myself, because I'm the one, the one and only you understand?

Halting your Champion just lets you focus a little harder and freezes the lane a bit when the minions start hitting you. You could go into a custom game and just practice last hitting as precisely as possible with no runes/items/masteries or just focus on csing as much as possible in game. However you need to balance farming with trading/fighting.

[On better csing in general](https://www.pinterest.com/pin/439734351096970489/)

[on attack moving](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dgMMxTofZ5A) (I guess that is what you are talking about with pushing s). The guide is a little outdated but still covers what it is and how to do it. 

You can always tell your support to play passively, so that you can focus on farming :D
Thanks princess what position do you play? What rank are you?
